c74object.name: abc.hoa.delay~
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.delay~ is an High Order Ambisonics (HOA) delay process. This object have two modes : syn and fx. The fx mode applies delay to the ambisonics channels and the syn mode generates spatial delayed components from one mono signal at a given ambisonic order N.
The delay is defined for each i spatial component among P=2*N+1 at the ambisonic order N in 2D as a delay of factor*delay_i. By default, the P delays are equally spread between win/N and win which the maximum delay in milliseconds.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: sets the mode of delay process. Possible values: 'fx', 'syn', 'man'.
attribute.digest: sets the mode of delay process

attribute.name: deltime[index]
attribute.description: sets the delay time in millisecond of the [index] ambisonic component [init=100, min=2, max=10000, step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the delay time of the [index] ambisonic component

attribute.name: feedback
attribute.description: sets the feedback amont value between 0 and 0.99, 0 means no feedback [init=0, min=0, max=1, step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the feedback factor value between 0 and 1

attribute.name: factor
attribute.description: sets the factor of delay, 0 means all delay lines are at 0 ms, 1 means all delay lines are at his defined value [init=1:min=0:max=1: step=0.01]

method.name: deltime[index]
method.description: sets the delay time in millisecond of the [index] ambisonic component [init=100, min=2, max=10000, step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the delay time of the [index] ambisonic component

method.digest: sets the feedback factor value between 0 and 1

method.description: sets the factor of delay, 0 means all delay lines are at 0 ms, 1 means all delay lines are at his defined value [init=1:min=0:max=1: step=0.01]
